Before the launch and subsequent acquisition of Sometrics by American Express , Swanson was business development manager for Userplane, an AOL company that provides social media apps to hundreds of thousands of online communities, supporting millions of users daily. He was instrumental in helping the company extend the reach of its hosted chat, IM and other communications apps, and in building the companyâ€™s ad network. Prior to Userplane, he was an executive with Sprint and helped launch two mobile web startups.

He has been invited to speak on many topics relating to platform apps, social marketing, performance-based analytics and game discovery.
